start: ^A long time ago, a couple of orcs stole my candy.
^Like wt t f!? I want that candy. I NEED it.
noCandy: ^If I see you again in 100 years, it'll be way too soon, Capisce?
success: ^Here, I'll just go into your shit and put something in yo bag.
^If you don't like it, I don't give a FUCK! Boom. KTHX.
failure: ^OMG, I said I didn't want to see you if you don't have canddyyy.
^So go do whatever the shit it is you do... or find my candy, SQUID!
^It's that simple. Now on your way.
^If you come back and talk with me again without my candy, I'll just repeat myself, ha! toodaloo
postCompletion: ^Oh. Holy crap you're lost! Looking for someone else's lost junk?
^I would help you like you helped me,
^buttt...nah. Anywhooo...good luck with, uh, you're life.
